CacheUtility::_add ( $  id,
$  data,
$  ttl = 0,
$  forceMethod = false 
) [protected]

write only data to the cache if item is nonexistant or expired

Parameters:
string $id an unique-id of the data you want to write
mixed $data data to write
int $ttl time to live in seconds
int $forceMethod which caching method to use (only this time)
Returns:
boolean true on success

CacheUtility::initMemcached ( $  withD = false  )  [protected]

add all memcache-servers we know about, or just return if we already did it. uses all servers defined in MEMCACHED_SERVERS, see core.php
